lifespan.short: Try to get eight hours of sleep a day.
tips: Turn the thermostat down to about 68 degrees.
Cover your windows with dark curtains or shades to block out light.
Take the electronics out of your bedroom.

lifespan.short: Know and be able to articulate your sense of purpose.
Curate four or five friends who have healthy habits.
lifespan.theoretical:
Complex friendships with similar / same health goals.
                      These kinds of relationships pull you towards their healthy
                      habits without effort like gravity does physical objects.
